BR_text.BRsummary: The Harvester GUI can't set True to IBoolean nodes.
BR_text.BRdescription:
Describe the bug
 The Harvester GUI can't change the value of IBoolean nodes.
 To Reproduce
 Steps to reproduce the behavior:
 
 Launch the Harvester GUI.
 Connect a device and open the attribute controller window.
 Try setting True to an IBoolean node.
 You'll see the value turns False.
 
 Expected behavior
 The Harvester GUI must be able to change the value of IBoolean nodes.
 Screenshots
 None.

 None.
 Smartphone (please complete the following information):
 None.
 Additional context
 None.
